text: Gangster Story is a 1960 American crime drama movie directed by Walter Matthau (who also stars) and also starring Carol Grace, Garry Walberg, Bruce MacFarlane, Clegg Hoyt, Raikin Ben-Ari. ==Other websites== * Category:1960 crime drama movies Category:1960s American crime drama movies Category:Movies set in California
title: Gangster Story
